channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Kansas university was named #1 for having the friendliest students in the U.S.
3/13: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Changes to Justice Department’s Civil Rights Division under Trump; Reporter’s notebook: Reexamining the Swiss cheese model

item.title: How disease detectives are hunting for viruses at major U.S. airports
item.description: A CDC program tests wastewater from airplanes, looking for pathogens that may have hitched a ride with passengers on long-haul international flights.

item.title: Once-routine immigration check-ins become high-stakes calculation as some are detained
Big March storm system threatens US with tornadoes, blizzards and wildfire risk
item.description: A sweeping storm system moving across the U.S. threatens to bring tornadoes, blizzards and possibly wildfires to different regions of the country.
